item.title: Dice Dreams: Free Rolls For August 2025
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Dice Dreams Links For August 2025
  • How To Redeem Dice Links In Dice Dreams

From attacking opponents and collecting resources to upgrading your kingdom, Dice Dreams is a great option for everyone who enjoys board games with a competitive twist. As the name implies, the core mechanic of Dice Dreams revolves around rolling dice to determine movement and actions on the board.

If you feel like your dice supply is running low, you can use dice links to get free rolls in Dice Dreams . With these free rolls, you can continue rolling the dice to build your kingdom, collect resources, and compete with other players to become the true Dice King.

Updated August 5, 2025, by Usama Ali: If you’re out of dice in Dice Dreams, there’s a smarter way to keep playing. Instead of waiting around or spending real money, you can use free Dice Dreams links to score extra rolls, coins, and special rewards. These links are a quick way to top up your dice stash and stay in the game a little while longer. This guide is updated regularly with the latest working links, so you never miss a freebie. Just tap, claim, and get back to your rolling adventures in Dice Dreams.

We didn't find any new links today.

Dice Dreams Links For August 2025

Like most board games, the developers of Dice Dreams regularly introduce dice links for players running low on dice. These links can be helpful in continuing your progress and can be used to redeem various rewards, including rolls and Building Blitz, which can consequently help you build your kingdom. Moreover, these links occasionally reward millions of coins, but most of the time, you'll receive rolls. Below is a list of active links that Dice Dreams players can use to earn some free goodies.

Link

Date

50 Rolls

Aug 03, 2025

50 Rolls

Aug 03, 2025

50 Rolls

Aug 01, 2025

50 Rolls

July 31, 2025

These links are only active for a limited time period, so make sure to redeem them before they expire.

In addition to redeeming rewards from these links, you can earn rolls in Dice Dreams through various other methods. These include regularly participating in events, inviting friends to the game, and taking advantage of in-game promotions and offers. While spending real money is not recommended, you can invite new players or link your Facebook account to get rolls for free.

Expired Dice Dream Links

Like most mobile games, Dice Dreams links expire quickly, usually within a day or so. Recently, there’s been a noticeable shift in the frequency of these link releases, and developers have reduced their quantity. As such, it’s uncertain how long the links will remain active moving forward. For your convenience, here are some expired Dice Dreams links:

How To Redeem Dice Links In Dice Dreams

To redeem a link in Dice Dreams for its reward, you'll first have to click on the links mentioned above. These links will redirect you to another page where you'll see "Get." Click on that, and you'll be redirected to your game, where you'll receive the respective rewards instantly.

You need to have the Dice Dreams app installed before clicking on the link, or else the links and "Get" button will not work.

Make sure to only click on dice links from trustworthy sources to avoid malware or data leakage issues. The links included here have been tried and tested to ensure players don't run into any problems.

item.title: JRPGs Protagonists Who Are The Best Leaders
item.description:
Summary

  • Adol Christin exemplifies silent leadership and inspiring bravery in Ys 8: Lacrimosa of Dana.
  • Serenoa Wolffort allows players to shape his fate as a leader through choices in Triangle Strategy.
  • Joker embodies inspirational leadership and commands the Phantom Thieves in Persona 5 Royal.

The role of the JRPG protagonist is one of the most important in the game, since, normally, players follow the story from these characters’ perspective, so they must be well developed for the entire narrative to remain engaging. They usually have multiple facets, such as the reluctant hero or even those who are good leaders, inspiring allies during combat or other moments of the journey not to give up.

Thus, the JRPG protagonists who are the best leaders have a remarkable ability to inspire confidence amid chaos, whether through sheer charisma or outstanding tactical brilliance. These characters serve as the main point of identification for players, evolving as the story progresses and growing stronger through mistakes or successes, so their leadership shapes much of what happens in the game.

Adol Christin (Ys 8: Lacrimosa of Dana)

Silent Leadership And Inspiring Bravery

4 Images
4 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Ys 8: Lacrimosa Of DANA
Action RPG
Systems
8.0 /10
Released
September 12, 2017
ESRB
T For Teen Due To Blood, Fantasy Violence, Language, Suggestive Themes, Use of Alcohol
Developer(s)
Nihon Falcom
Publisher(s)
Nihon Falcom

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Powered by

Adol Christin personifies the silent heroic leader whose leadership is displayed through constant acts of bravery and determination, especially evident in Ys 8: Lacrimosa of Dana . After the shipwreck on the mysterious Isle of Seiren, Adol naturally assumes command of the castaways, patiently organizing them into a stable community and taking direct responsibility for everyone’s daily safety and long-term well-being.

His strategic skill shines in planning expeditions, fortifying and defending Castaway Village, and charting efficient routes through the island’s hostile terrain. The absolute trust Adol inspires stems from his tireless courage and unwaveringly selfless attitude, qualities that truly cement the companions’ loyalty and turn him into a beacon of hope and determination whenever the group faces dangers that defy imagination.

Serenoa Wolffort (Triangle Strategy)

Players Can Shape His Fate As A Leader

9 Images
9 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Triangle Strategy
RPG
Tactical
Systems
OpenCritic Reviews
Top Critic Avg: 83 /100 Critics Rec: 90%
Released
March 4, 2022
ESRB
t
Developer(s)
Square Enix, Artdink
Publisher(s)
Square Enix, Nintendo

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Powered by

One of the most intriguing systems in Triangle Strategy is Convictions, through which players shape the protagonist’s mindset by the choices made along the journey, a dynamic that influences political alliances, battlefield conditions, and even character loyalties across the branching narrative. Even without that mechanic, Serenoa Wolffort stands among the genre’s finest leaders because he steadfastly upholds core principles while navigating extreme moral dilemmas that could break lesser heroes.

Beyond charismatic appeal, Serenoa also proves an outstanding battlefield commander, as players witness throughout the JRPG’s encounters: he leverages elevation, flanking, and elemental terrain effects to overwhelm numerically superior foes despite scarce resources. The narrative further highlights his diplomacy, empathy, and capacity to consult advisers, portraying a multidimensional statesman whose talents off the field enhance and validate every triumph won with steel and strategy.

Ichiban Kasuga (Yakuza: Like A Dragon)

He Managed To Lead A Great Group Of Misfits

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Yakuza: Like A Dragon
JRPG
Systems
9.5 /10
Released
November 10, 2020
ESRB
M for Mature: Blood, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol
Developer(s)
Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio
Publisher(s)
Sega

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Powered by

Although Kiryu remains a central figure in the Yakuza saga, the arrival of Ichiban Kasuga as the new protagonist simultaneously unveiled one of the franchise’s strongest leaders. Despite a seemingly carefree demeanor fueled by boundless optimism and magnetic charisma, Kasuga rallies individuals marginalized by society and forges them into a cohesive team, demonstrating an uncanny ability to recognize and cultivate latent potential in every companion.

Narratively, Yakuza: Like a Dragon positions Ichiban against adversaries whose political power and criminal influence dwarf anything the series previously showcased, yet he perseveres and prevails through sheer determination and unbreakable faith in his friends. Securing unwavering loyalty from his companions, the protagonist guides the unlikely crew toward astounding victories, including a climactic stand-off with Ryo Aoki, vividly illustrating how inspirational resolve can overcome seemingly insurmountable odds.

Joker (Persona 5 Royal)

Able to Inspire the Phantom Thieves Masterfully

3 Images
3 Images
Persona 5 Royal
JRPG
Adventure
Systems
10.0 /10
Released
October 31, 2019
ESRB
m
Developer(s)
P Studio, Atlus
Publisher(s)
P Studio, Atlus

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

Although the Persona series features several characters adept at leadership, Joker embodies the role most convincingly in Persona 5 Royal . Falsely accused of assault and branded a delinquent, he turns that stigma into a rallying point, assembling fellow misfits and transforming them into a daring symbol of hope that galvanizes Tokyo’s oppressed during their surreal, reality-bending heists across the city.

Despite his largely silent demeanor, Atlus imbues Joker with palpable charisma through nuanced body language and the limited dialogue choices available to players, ensuring his presence commands attention even without lengthy speeches. Consequently, every member of the team defers to his judgment, proving that authentic respect, rather than force, lies at the heart of effective command within rebels intent on rewriting society’s corrupt rules.

Ike (Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance)

From Mercenary To One Of The Best Leaders In JRPGs

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance
Tactical
RPG
Systems
Released
April 20, 2005
ESRB
Teen // Fantasy Violence
Developer(s)
Intelligent Systems
Publisher(s)
Nintendo
Franchise
Fire Emblem
Number of Players
1

Powered by

Among all Fire Emblem protagonists, Ike exemplifies exemplary leadership most clearly, largely because his story rejects inherited privilege. Beginning life as a simple mercenary, he climbs the ranks through merit alone until commanding entire armies in Fire Emblem: Path of Radiance and its sequel Radiant Dawn , proving that courage, skill, and humility can eclipse birthright on the path to greatness.

Players witness that evolution firsthand, observing each difficult choice he confronts and every brutal battlefield where decisive tactical insight and raw determination secure victories against overwhelming odds. This long arc demonstrates that Ike’s authority is forged through perseverance, compassion, and unflinching moral conviction rather than noble lineage, permanently cementing his legacy as one of the medium’s most inspirational field commanders.

Cecil Harvey (Final Fantasy 4)

A Journey Of Redemption That Inspires

6 Images
6 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Final Fantasy 4
JRPG
Systems
7.8 /10
Released
July 19, 1991
ESRB
e
Developer(s)
Square
Publisher(s)
Square

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Powered by

Cecil Harvey begins his path in Final Fantasy 4 as a Dark Knight, the feared commander of the Red Wings, suddenly seized by a profound crisis of conscience after carrying out the tyrannical orders of the king he once revered as a father. Moral anguish propels Cecil onto a grueling journey of redemption, forcing him to relinquish inner darkness and be reborn as a Paladin, a living symbol of justice and light.

This moral transformation forms the core of Cecil’s leadership, as he openly acknowledges past wrongdoing and actively pursues atonement, offering allies a rare example of sincere humility and unwavering courage. As a Paladin, Cecil stands as a resolute yet compassionate leader whose commitment to safeguarding the innocent and confronting evil rallies his party into a united front against Zemus’s looming threat.

Noah (Xenoblade Chronicles 3)

Achieved A Feat That Seemed Impossible

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Xenoblade Chronicles 3
RPG
Systems
6.0 /10
Released

ESRB
T For Teen due to Language, Mild Blood, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
Monolith
Publisher(s)
Nintendo

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Powered by

Few JRPG protagonists can claim to have united two warring nations in pursuit of a shared future, yet that is precisely what Noah of Xenoblade Chronicles 3 accomplishes. Serving as an off-seer who honors fallen comrades with a mournful flute, he treasures every life and leverages that worldview to earn the trust of soldiers from both Keves and Agnus, guiding them toward the war’s end.

Through measured words and formidable combat skills alike, Noah seizes every opportunity throughout Xenoblade Chronicles 3 to present his perspective, inspiring even hostile opponents to reconsider long-held convictions. Even while confronting cosmic-scale threats, a hallmark of the series, the game’s protagonist sustains morale within the ranks, demonstrating that empathy and hope can endure when destiny itself hangs in the balance for every soldier under his command.

Rean Schwarzer (The Legend Of Heroes: Trails Of Cold Steel)

A Central Leader Within The Franchise

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Trails of Cold Steel 4
JRPG

t

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

Rean Schwarzer first stands out as a natural bridge among the students of Class VII at Thors Military Academy in Trails of Cold Steel , smoothing internal disagreements through empathy and pragmatic insight. His attentiveness and swift conflict resolution rapidly elevate him to a pivotal role, and during Erebonia’s turbulent civil war, his absolutely steady inspiration keeps classmates united even when battles reach their bleakest moments.

As the Ashen Chevalier, Rean fuses exceptional martial prowess with effective tactics, becoming indispensable both in direct engagements and in complex strategic operations that employ the Divine Knight Valimar. His capacity to adapt to unforeseen circumstances and kindle motivation in allies cements a reputation for exemplary command, earning deep respect on the battlefield and in every sphere of Erebonian society.

Tir McDohl (Suikoden)

A Figure Who Can Rally Many Allies To His Cause

6 Images
6 Images

Your comment has not been saved

Developer(s)

Publisher(s)
Konami
Franchise
Suikoden

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

Enter an ancient world of bravery, mysticism, and romance

In this epic role-playing adventure, you will roam the land trying to build an army of rebels. On your quest for freedom from the Scarlet Moon Empire, you will meet many people who will provide you with guidance and friendship - and many who will try to crush you under their boots. Let your head and heart guide you, but a word of advice; a sharpened sword and a touch of magic will lead to a longer life!

Powered by

The Suikoden franchise boasts some of the finest narratives ever crafted for a JRPG, and Tir McDohl, protagonist of the debut entry, stands among gaming’s most compelling leadership figures. Forced into war at a young age, he reluctantly shoulders duty yet still guides the Liberation Army to success against the corrupt imperial regime’s seemingly overwhelming might and brutal systemic oppression.

Before victory could be won, Tir faced an equally daunting task: persuading all 108 Stars of Destiny to unite under a single banner, a feat that magnifies his stature as a strategic and inspirational icon. Though later protagonists, most notably in Suikoden II , share a similar spirit, it was Tir McDohl who established the archetype of principled leadership that would define the series for generations.

Ramza Beoulve (Final Fantasy Tactics)

One Of The Greatest Leaders Of The War Of The Lions

Your comment has not been saved

Follow
Followed
Final Fantasy Tactics
Tactical
RPG

14
8.9 /10
Released
June 20, 1997
ESRB
t
Developer(s)
Square
Publisher(s)
Square, Sony Computer Entertainment
Engine
Luminous
Franchise
Final Fantasy

Powered by

Final Fantasy has long produced a diverse and fascinating cast of protagonists, yet Ramza Beoulve of the tactical RPG Final Fantasy Tactics ranks among the franchise’s most remarkable leaders. Rejecting inherited privilege, he confronts society’s corrupt hierarchies head-on and, despite condemnation as a heretic, still guides loyal companions against ruthless demonic forces poised to utterly tear the once-peaceful Ivalice apart.

The tragedy of Ramza’s saga lies in history’s failure to acknowledge those deeds; surviving records of the War of the Lions instead elevate Delita Hyral as its lone hero while omitting the man who shaped every critical turning point. Thus, he embodies the archetype of the silent hero, one whose leadership secured Ivalice’s future yet garnered no public glory for the sacrifices that made victory possible.

item.title: Sniper Elite Fans Can Grab $210 Worth of Games for $14, But Time's Running Out
item.description:
Gamers have until August 6 to grab five mainline Sniper Elite games, including a remaster and a deluxe edition, for just $14, with no strings attached. Developed and published by Rebellion, Sniper Elite is considered one of the best third-person tactical shooter franchises. And its recent installments have received mostly positive reviews on Steam.

The first Sniper Elite game, included in the current offer, was released back in 2005, which means the franchise is now 20 years old. Since then, the series has seen several mainline entries and spin-offs, including the Zombie Army Trilogy and a VR edition. Most recently, in 2025, the franchise released Sniper Elite: Resistance , a follow-up to the fifth game, which was launched in 2022.

Humble Bundle's $14 Sniper Elite Classic Collection Content

Right now, a new Humble Bundle deal, available until August 6 at around 5:30 PM PT, is offering five mainline Sniper Elite games for just $14 USD, with no catch. Even better, the deal includes the Season Pass for Sniper Elite 3 , which normally costs around $30 USD. In other words, for a price lower than one game's Season Pass, fans get Sniper Elite (2005), Sniper Elite V2 Remastered (2019), Sniper Elite 3 (2014), Sniper Elite 4 Deluxe Edition (2017), and Sniper Elite 5 (2022).

  • Sniper Elite: $8 USD
  • Sniper Elite V2 Remastered: $34 USD
  • Sniper Elite 3: $29 USD
  • Sniper Elite 4 Deluxe Edition: $90 USD
  • Sniper Elite 5: $50 USD
  • Sniper Elite 3 Season Pass: $30 USD

So far, over 30,000 gamers have benefited from the Humble Bundle offer, helping the company raise about $40,000 for charity, as it often does with its game bundles. It's worth noting that $14 USD is the minimum required to get all six offered items, but fans can choose to pay more if they wish to further support Humble Bundle and its partnered charities.

For those looking for an even more cost-effective game bundle, Humble also offers a $6 USD pack that includes the first three Sniper Elite games, along with the Season Pass for the third installment. And for $10 USD, it allows players to keep those four items, plus the Deluxe Edition of Sniper Elite 4 .

As one of the best shooter stealth game series, Sniper Elite is a must-play for fans of stealth gameplay and, of course, sniping. It's also worth noting that the average review scores for all six items in Humble Bundle's deal sit at 82% positive, with some even exceeding a 90% customer satisfaction rate on Steam.

item.title: Grounded 2: How to Survive Toxic Areas
item.description:
The map of Grounded 2 is dotted with multiple areas and points of interest where toxic fumes prevent players from exploring the region. Venturing deep into these locations is impossible without the proper equipment and preparation.

Fortunately, dealing with toxic areas is easier than it might appear, as it only requires a single item to completely nullify all toxic damage to the player. Here’s how it works.

How to Survive Toxic Areas in Grounded 2

The best way to deal with Toxic gas in Grounded 2 is to use a Gas Mask , a craftable armor piece that allows the player character to breathe in toxic fumes safely, nullifying all negative effects. Not only does this allow players to safely traverse areas like the Garbage Can without issue, but it also neutralizes the toxic gas emitted by Stinkbugs in the game.

Alternatively, players can also use Gastroo Goo , a healing item that provides the Gas Guard buff for a short duration when consumed, achieving the same effect as the Gas Mask.

How to Craft a Gas Mask in Grounded 2

Players can craft a Gas Mask using the following materials:

Item

Materials

Crafting Station

Gas Mask

Weevil Nose x1

Workbench

Gnat Fuzz x4

Crude Rope x2

Stinkbug Part x1

The Gas Mask loses durability when the effects of Gas Guard are actively being used, which only occurs when the player is in a toxic zone. As it is the only armor piece in the game that provides immunity to toxic biomes, it’s worth upgrading it using Brittle Plating to increase durability.

How to Make Gastroo Goo in Grounded 2

Gastroo Goo can be crafted at a Smoothie Station with the following ingredients:

Item

Ingredient

Base

Crafting Station

Gastroo Goo

Stinkbug Gas Sack x1

Grub Sludge OR Gum Nugget

Smoothie Station

Roach Chunk x1

Aphid Honeydew x1

To make a Smoothie, players will need to select a base for the mixture. They will have two options: Grub Sludge and Gum Nugget. Using the Gum Nugget as the base will give Gastroo Goo the Sticky modifier, which makes it so the effects of the smoothie last longer. Grub Sludge offers no additional benefits.

item.title: Pokemon GO: Swirlix Spotlight Hour Event Guide
item.description:
Pokemon GO has a wide range of one-off and recurring events for players to enjoy on a regular basis with each new Season that comes into play. With the Delightful Days Season, a number of different themed one-off opportunities have been available for players to participate in, as well as the likes of regular Raid events, Community Days, Max Monday, and Spotlight Hours.

During early August, there is a Swirlix Spotlight hour lined up alongside the Sweet Swarm event, which also puts a focus on Swirlix, as well as Combee. However, Spotlight Hours are a short, one-day-only opportunity that lasts just an hour, so players will need to prepare in advance in order to make the most of each event. If you're curious about what Pokemon GO's Swirlix Spotlight Hour will entail, all relevant information has been outlined in the guide below.

Swirlix Spotlight Hour in Pokemon GO

In Pokemon GO , the Swirlix Spotlight Hour will be available in-game on August 5, 2025 , between the hours of 6 PM and 7 PM, local time . During this time, Swirlix will be appearing in the wild much more frequently, giving players the opportunity to farm encounters with the monster, search for competitive battling potential across stats, and even try their luck at hunting for a shiny Swirlix.

Since Swirlix Spotlight Hour is taking place whilst Sweet Swarm is live, and Sweet Swarm offers the bonus of Swirlix having boosted shiny rates, this is the perfect opportunity for shiny hunters to give a shot at stumbling across one of these alternate colored variants. If they wish, they can then also choose to evolve their shiny Swirlix into shiny Slurpuff, so long as the evolution requirements are met. Capturing as many Swirlix as possible will help with this task, as you can transfer extra Pokemon in exchange for extra Candies.

Lastly, every Spotlight Hour event also offers a bonus across the one-hour period for players to use to their advantage. The bonus for Swirlix Spotlight Hour is 2x Catch Stardus t. Once again, with this bonus, farming captures of Swirlix is key. Not only will you be able to farm extra Stardust through this method, but you can also pile up some Candies for evolving your most preferred/favorable Swirlix into Slurpuff.
